journey.title: Our Spiritual Journey
journey.description: Established in 2010 by 10 passionate Karyakartas, Shree Shiv Jyoti Sankirtan Mandal began with a vision to spread the divine joy of Kirtan and Jagran across communities. Rooted in Vrindavan, the land of Lord Krishna, our organization has grown to organize over 1,000 soulful events, touching the lives of thousands of devotees. We strive to foster spiritual awakening and community unity through our services.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To bring the divine vibrations of Kirtan and Jagran to every home, fostering spiritual growth, devotion, and unity. We aim to make sacred experiences accessible through our bus seva, Dharamshala, and community events.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To create a world where every soul experiences the bliss of bhakti, connected through love, compassion, and spiritual harmony, inspired by the teachings of Vrindavan’s sacred traditions.
